name: Understaffed - 0 Days Since Last Escape
description:
During the COVID-19 outbreak you apparently didn't get the memo that all prison guards were supposed to go home.

Now you are the only two guards left in a prison full of angry inmates. You better do your best to keep all of them secured in their cells. Otherwise, things might get ... out of control.

This is our submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2020 with the theme "Out of Control"

Come joing our friendly Game Dev Discord server here :)
